name: daadaar
description: Decentralized, anonymous platform for exposing government injustices in Iran

scripts.build: bun --cwd frontend run build && bun --cwd backend run build
scripts.type-check: bun --cwd frontend run type-check && bun --cwd backend run type-check
scripts.test: bun --cwd frontend run test && bun --cwd backend run test
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules shared/node_modules node_modules
